titleStmt.title: A true and lively representation of popery shewing that popery is only new-modell'd paganism, and perfectly destructive of the great ends and purposes of God in the Gospel.
titleStmt.author: Owen, Thankfull, 1620-1681.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Everingham for W. Kettilby ...,

notesStmt.note: Written by Thankfull Owen. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
